languages.text: {n}Посерьезнев, девушка без улыбки отвечает:{/n} "Не сейчас, {name}. Не сегодня. Ты, наверное, будешь смеяться надо мной, но я боюсь оставаться с тобой наедине без своей маски. Беззащитность — это страшно. Но я обязательно преодолею этот страх".

{n}Her face turning serious, she replies, unsmiling,{/n} "Not now, {name}. Not today. You will probably laugh at me, but I'm afraid to be alone with you without my mask. Vulnerability is frightening. But I know I will overcome my fear in time."
languages.original_text: {n}Посерьезнев, девушка без улыбки отвечает:{/n} "Не сейчас, {name}. Не сегодня. Ты, наверное, будешь смеяться надо мной, но я боюсь оставаться с тобой наедине без своей маски. Беззащитность — это страшно. Но я обязательно преодолею этот страх".

traits.locale_text: {n}Her face turning serious, she replies, unsmiling,{/n} "Not now, {name}. Not today. You will probably laugh at me, but I'm afraid to be alone with you without my mask. Vulnerability is frightening. But I know I will overcome my fear in time."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Her face turning serious, she replies, unsmiling,{/n} "Not now, {name}. Not today. You will probably laugh at me, but I'm afraid to be alone with you without my mask. Vulnerability is frightening. But I know I will overcome my fear in time."

traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Her face turning serious, she replies, unsmiling,{/n} "Not now, {name}. Not today. You will probably laugh at me, but I'm afraid to be alone with you without my mask. Vulnerability is frightening. But I know I will overcome my fear in time."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Te responde con cara seria y sin sonreír.{/n} «Ahora no, {name}. Hoy no. Probablemente se ría, pero me da miedo estar a solas con usted sin mi máscara. Ser vulnerable es algo que me aterra. Pero sé que con el tiempo superaré mis miedos».
languages.original_text: {n}Her face turning serious, she replies, unsmiling,{/n} "Not now, {name}. Not today. You will probably laugh at me, but I'm afraid to be alone with you without my mask. Vulnerability is frightening. But I know I will overcome my fear in time."

traits.locale_text: {n}Te responde con cara seria y sin sonreír.{/n} «Ahora no, {name}. Hoy no. Probablemente se ría, pero me da miedo estar a solas con usted sin mi máscara. Ser vulnerable es algo que me aterra. Pero sé que con el tiempo superaré mis miedos».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}她的表情变得严肃，不苟言笑地回答道。{/n}“现在不行，{name}，至少今天不行。或许你会笑话我，但我害怕在不戴面具的情况下与你独处，弱点实在是太令人恐惧了。但我知道，假以时日，我一定能克服这种恐惧。”
languages.original_text: {n}Her face turning serious, she replies, unsmiling,{/n} "Not now, {name}. Not today. You will probably laugh at me, but I'm afraid to be alone with you without my mask. Vulnerability is frightening. But I know I will overcome my fear in time."

traits.locale_text: {n}她的表情变得严肃，不苟言笑地回答道。{/n}“现在不行，{name}，至少今天不行。或许你会笑话我，但我害怕在不戴面具的情况下与你独处，弱点实在是太令人恐惧了。但我知道，假以时日，我一定能克服这种恐惧。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}彼女は真剣な表情になり、真顔で答える。{/n}「ダメだよ、{name}。今日はダメだ。あんたは笑うかもしれないけど、マスクなしであんたと2人っきりになるのは怖い。弱いってことは恐ろしい。だけど、その内その恐怖をきっと乗り越えるよ」
languages.original_text: {n}Her face turning serious, she replies, unsmiling,{/n} "Not now, {name}. Not today. You will probably laugh at me, but I'm afraid to be alone with you without my mask. Vulnerability is frightening. But I know I will overcome my fear in time."

traits.locale_text: {n}彼女は真剣な表情になり、真顔で答える。{/n}「ダメだよ、{name}。今日はダメだ。あんたは笑うかもしれないけど、マスクなしであんたと2人っきりになるのは怖い。弱いってことは恐ろしい。だけど、その内その恐怖をきっと乗り越えるよ」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Elle prend un air grave et vous répond d'un ton sérieux :{/n} « Pas maintenant, {name}. Pas aujourd'hui. Vous allez probablement vous moquer de moi, mais j'ai trop peur de me retrouver seule à {mf|seul|seule} avec vous sans mon masque. C'est une position de vulnérabilité qui m'effraie, mais le temps aidant, j'ai bon espoir de surmonter mes craintes. »
languages.original_text: {n}Her face turning serious, she replies, unsmiling,{/n} "Not now, {name}. Not today. You will probably laugh at me, but I'm afraid to be alone with you without my mask. Vulnerability is frightening. But I know I will overcome my fear in time."

traits.locale_text: {n}Elle prend un air grave et vous répond d'un ton sérieux :{/n} « Pas maintenant, {name}. Pas aujourd'hui. Vous allez probablement vous moquer de moi, mais j'ai trop peur de me retrouver seule à {mf|seul|seule} avec vous sans mon masque. C'est une position de vulnérabilité qui m'effraie, mais le temps aidant, j'ai bon espoir de surmonter mes craintes. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ihre Miene wird ernst und sie antwortet ohne zu lächeln:{/n} "Nicht jetzt, {name}. Nicht heute. Ihr werdet mich vermutlich auslachen, doch ich habe Angst davor, ohne meine Maske mit Euch allein zu sein. Verletzlichkeit ist furchterregend. Doch ich weiß, dass ich meine Furcht mit der Zeit überwinden werde."
languages.original_text: {n}Her face turning serious, she replies, unsmiling,{/n} "Not now, {name}. Not today. You will probably laugh at me, but I'm afraid to be alone with you without my mask. Vulnerability is frightening. But I know I will overcome my fear in time."

Ihr werdet mich vermutlich auslachen, doch ich habe Angst davor, ohne meine Maske mit Euch allein zu sein. Verletzlichkeit ist furchterregend. Doch ich weiß, dass ich meine Furcht mit der Zeit überwinden werde."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Her face turning serious, she replies, unsmiling,{/n} "Not now, . Not today. You will probably laugh at me, but I'm afraid to be alone with you without my mask. Vulnerability is frightening. But I know I will overcome my fear in time."

languages.text: {n}Yüzünü ciddileştirip cevap veriyor.{/n} "Şimdi olmaz {name}. Bugün olmaz. Belki bana güleceksin ama maskem olmadan seninle yalnız kalmaktan korkuyorum. Savunmasızlık korkutucu bir şey. Zamanla korkumun üstesinden geleceğimi biliyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}Her face turning serious, she replies, unsmiling,{/n} "Not now, {name}. Not today. You will probably laugh at me, but I'm afraid to be alone with you without my mask. Vulnerability is frightening. But I know I will overcome my fear in time."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yüzü ciddileşiyor ve gülümsemeden cevap veriyor.{/n} "Şimdi olmaz {name}. Bugün olmaz. Belki bana gülebilirsin ama maskem olmadan seninle yalnız kalmaktan korkuyorum. Savunmasızlık korkutucu bir şey. Korkumun üstesinden zamanla geçeceğimi biliyorum ama."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
